attributes.action: provide funds to maintain the last airworthy vulcan bomber
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As there are only afew days left to save this brilliant aircraft which p;ayed a great part in detering the russians from invading Britain.Immediate action is urgently needed.The airplane is a symbol of British engineering excellence.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
